citations.narrative:
Four of the water receptacles in the outdoor enclosures had a coating of dark grime on the inside surface. The grime can
contaminate the water and it may not be potable. The water receptacles must be cleaned and sanitized and maintained.
Water receptacles must be kept clean and sanitized in accordance with § 3.11(b).
To be corrected by: 7 September 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.10(c) 
   
Watering 
Four of the water receptacles in the outdoor enclosures had a coating of dark grime on the inside surface. The grime can 
contaminate the water and it may not be potable. The water receptacles must be cleaned and sanitized and maintained. 
Water receptacles must be kept clean and sanitized in accordance with § 3.11(b). 
 
To be corrected by: 7 September 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
